text: Chhota Govindpur is a census town in Purbi Singhbhum district in the state of Jharkhand, India. ==Demographics== India census, Chhota Govindpur had a population of 24,751. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Chhota Govindpur has an average literacy rate of 76%, higher than the national average of 59.5%; with male literacy of 82% and female literacy of 69%. 12% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in East Singhbhum district
title: Chhota Gobindpur
